communications.subject: Delaware Freedom of Information Act Request: Delaware FOIA Request - 2/28/23
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Delaware Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all documents pertaining to the consideration and/or adoption of the “Advanced Clean Cars II” or “Advanced Clean Cars” regulation – sometimes also known as “ACC II” or “ACC II Regulation” or “ACC II rule” or “ACC” or “zero emission car” or “zero emission passenger vehicle rule” or “ZEV sales requirement” or “zero emission car sales” or “Zero Emission Vehicle program" and "ZEV mandate" — as it relates to correspondence pertaining to the following entities falling between 1/1/2020 to the date of fulfillment of this request.

Toyota (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@toyota.com”)

Stellantis (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@stellantis.com” and/or “@Chrysler.com")

Mercedes-Benz(including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@mbusa.com” and/or “@mercedes-benz.com”)

Ford Motor (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@ford.com”)

General Motors (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@gm.com”)

Hyundai / Kia Motors (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@hyundaiusa.com”, “@hyundai.com”, and/or “@kia.com”)

Jaguar Land Rover (Tata Motors) (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@tatamotors.com” and/or “@jaguarlandrover.com”)

Honda Motors (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@honda.com”)

Nissan (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@nissan.com”,“@nissan-usa.com”, “nissancanada.com”)

Volvo Cars (Geely Motors) (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@volvocars.com”,  “@geely.com”)

Mazda (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@mazda.com”, “@mazda.co.jp” and/or “@mazdausa.com”)

BMW Group (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@bmw.com”, “@bmwusa.com” and/or “@bmwgroup.com”)

Volkswagen Group (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@vw.com”, “@vwusa.com” and/or “@vwglobal.com”)

Jaguar Land Rover (Tata Motors) (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@jaguarlandrover.com” and @tatamotors.com)

Subaru Corporation (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@subaru.com”)

Tesla (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@tesla.com”)

Alliance for Automotive Innovation (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@autosinnovate.org”)

Zero Emission Transportation Association (ZETA) (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@zeta2030.org”)

National Automobile Dealers Association (NADA) (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@nada.org”)

American Legislative Exchange Council (ALEC) (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@alec.org”)

American Fuel & Petrochemical Manufacturers (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@afpm.org”)

American Petroleum Institute (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@api.com”)

Marathon Petroleum (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@marathonpetroleum.com”)

Valero (including, but not limited to searches for emails ending in the domains “@valero.com”)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jonathan Rudenberg, a citizen of Delaware, in coordination with Steve Horn.
